page.title: 16LEOMINSTER FAMILY'S WEEKEND
page.content: My normal weekend begins with mum getting me out of bed on Saturday at about half past eight. Soon I am making my way to the Minster School where I train as a member of the Leominster and District Youth Club Harriers. After athletics I go home and watch Grandstand and World of Sport. During the evening I sometimes play with my snooker table, play cricket in the garden or watch television. I get up at about ten o'clock on Sunday, read the newspaper and watch my brother play football in the morning. After dinner I change into my football kit to play football for Luston under twelves where mum and dad come and watch me. After the match, which we normally lose, we go home and my dad starts saying where we went wrong.
